description:
WHO IS GOAL MEDITATION FOR?

For driven achievers – For engaged success seekers – For committed self-developers – Those who plan their life ahead – Those who want to grow significantly – For those who need more confidence – Those who need more fitness motivation – Those who want to be less stressed – Those who would develop their time management skills and build success habits - Those who actively take care for their mind-body-soul balance.

WHY CHOOSE MEDITABLE?

Meditable empowers you to personalize your guided meditation experience. It gives your meditation sessions a boost, as you can - for the first time in meditation apps' history - totally personalize a guided session to fit your goals and schedules.

In the app, you can build your guided meditation from short guided tracks, which combined in a playlist, creates a smooth and highly effective meditation experience. This approach is totally new, as it is 100% tailor-made for your momentary needs and available time.

VISUALIZE YOUR GOALS

With Meditable, you can use enjoyable and effective mental techniques to reach your career, health, emotional and spiritual goals, in a unique customizable way.

Performance
* Be More Productive
* Achieve Your Goals
* Master Presentations & Meetings
* Nail Interviews
* Study & Exam Success

Health
* Heal & Re-energize
* Exercise Regularly
* Lose Weight & Eat Healthy

Inner Balance
* Relieve Stress & Anxiety
* Confidence and Self-esteem
* Restful Sleep

Spirituality
* Cultivate Gratitude
* Connect With Your Values
* Presence & Acceptance
* Attract Love

WHAT DOES MEDITABLE OFFER?

1. Proven goal meditation techniques to reach your desired targets

2. 80+ ready-to-go meditations that cover a multitude of self-improvement topics

3. Build your own meditation: combine short guided meditation tracks to create custom meditations that suit your time schedule and your desired goals

4. Select from multiple meditation deepener and ending tracks, choose from various background music tracks to personalize your relaxation

5. Edit all the existing meditations in our library to meet your needs in terms of content, duration, techniques and background music

6. Try meditation techniques such as visualization, affirmations and suggestions that are deeply rooted in well-researched psychological knowledge

7. All the meditations are created by our founding member who is a practicing hypnotherapist and psychologist, specialized in stress management, eliminating anxiety and boosting self-confidence

GOAL MEDITATION VS MINDFULNESS

Goal meditation is invented to complete mindfulness with a practical goal oriented approach, that really makes your mind attract success. Use mindfulness meditation to become still, independent from the monkey mind, and use goal meditation in the forms of active visualization, self-statements and mindset-forming suggestions to attract great results, love and success in your life.

FREE DOWNLOAD & FREE 14-DAY TRIAL 

Full access to content and features for 14 days. After the trial, free access to 4 guided & 6 unguided meditations, without the features of customization.

SUBSCRIPTION OPTIONS

With Meditable Premium you can enjoy all 80+ guided meditations with full customization features. We offer two subscription options:
 
*Monthly Premium: $9.99 per month
 
*Yearly Premium: $77.99 per year (Save 35%) 

These prices are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence.

Your Meditable subscription will automatically renew at the end of each term and your credit card will be charged through your iTunes account. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes account settings but refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term.

Terms & Conditions: http://getmeditable.com/terms-and-conditions  

SUPPORT

Quick support: info@getmeditable.com or via twitter: https://twitter.com/meditableapp
